youtube.texte descriptif: KYA-ENERGY GROUP is an international company specializing in renewable energy (particularly solar energy) and energy efficiency. It works to sustainably address Africa‚Äôs electrification challenge. Founding member of the Synergie des Acteurs des Energies Renouvelables (SAER-TOGO), and international associations such as the Global Off Grid Lighting Association (GOGLA) and the Africa Minigrid Developers Association (AMDA).
